      • listFilesRecursively

        public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> listFilesRecursively(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter fileFilter)
                                                                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                   java.io.IOException
        Helper method to list out all files under a specified path. The specified PathFilter is treated as a file filter, that is it is only applied to file Paths.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • listMostNestedPathRecursively

        public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> listMostNestedPathRecursively(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                                                                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter fileFilter)
                                                                                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                            java.io.IOException
        Method to list out all files, or directory if no file exists, under a specified path. The specified PathFilter is treated as a file filter, that is it is only applied to file Paths.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • listPathsRecursively

        public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> listPathsRecursively(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                                                                   org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter fileFilter)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Helper method to list out all paths under a specified path. If the FileSystem is unable to list the contents of a relevant directory, will log an error and skip.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
